.. _`service_levels_15`:

Service Levels
##############

Changes in 15.3.0 Service Level 9
=================================


Changes in Object Framework API: LocalizedField in cs.vp.classification
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Since version 15.3.0 the fields :envvar:`cs.vp.classification.PropertySet.name`
and :envvar:`cs.vp.classification.Property.name` are multilingual fields.
These can be used as described in the *Powerscript API* manual.

The old LocalizedFields have been replaced by
:envvar:`cs.vp.classification.PropertySet.Name` and
:envvar:`cs.vp.classification.Property.Name`.
